name: You Must Live
description:
Controls: WASD

Made for the Cursed Book bitsy game jam!

This is my first game ever made and I had alot of fun playing around with bitsy and seeing just what I could do with only 8x8 frames to work with. Feel free to leave any suggestions below because after the jam I'm thinking about making an actual game.

Music: Tomorrow - Benjamin Tissot (AKA bensound)
